targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        i.region AS region,
        COUNT(i.id) AS total
FROM gcp_instance AS i
WHERE i.project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY i.region;

SELECT
        i.zone AS zone,
        COUNT(i.id) AS total
FROM gcp_instance AS i
WHERE i.project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY i.zone

SELECT
        i.cpu_platform AS cpu_platform,
        COUNT(i.id) AS total
FROM gcp_instance AS i
WHERE i.project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY i.cpu_platform

SELECT
        i.status AS status,
        COUNT(i.id) AS total
FROM gcp_instance AS i
WHERE i.project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY i.status

SELECT 
        region, 
        COUNT(ip_address) 
FROM gcp_public_address
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY region;

SELECT 
        origin, 
        COUNT(ip_address)
FROM gcp_public_address
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY origin;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gcp_public_address WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project);

SELECT
        s.region,
        COUNT(s.id)
FROM gcp_subnet as s
WHERE s.project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY s.region;

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM gcp_subnet
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project);

SELECT
        b.location AS region_name,
        COUNT(b.id) AS buckets
FROM gcp_bucket AS b
WHERE b.project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY region_name

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM gcp_bucket
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project);

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM gcp_nic
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project);

SELECT
        region, COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_forwarding_rule
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY region;

SELECT
        load_balancing_scheme, COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_forwarding_rule
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY load_balancing_scheme;

SELECT
        ip_protocol, COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_forwarding_rule
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY ip_protocol;

panels.description: Total number of forwarding rules (Load Balancer Frontends)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM gcp_forwarding_rule
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project);

panels.title: Number of Forwarding Rules

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        location, COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_gke_cluster
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY location;

SELECT
        current_master_version, COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_gke_cluster
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY current_master_version;

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM gcp_gke_cluster
WHERE project_id in ($gcp_project);

SELECT
        COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_disk
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)

SELECT
        region, COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_disk
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY region;

SELECT
        type, COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_disk
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY type;

SELECT
        CONCAT(size_gb, 'GB'), COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_disk
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY CONCAT(size_gb, 'GB')

SELECT
        SUM(size_gb)
FROM gcp_disk
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)

panels.description: GCP Target Pools by Region (LB Backend)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        region,
        COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_target_pool
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)
GROUP BY region

panels.title: GCP Target Pools by Region

panels.description: Total number of Target Pools (Load Balancer Backend)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM gcp_target_pool
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project);

panels.title: Number of Target Pools

panels.description: GCP IAM principal role counts, extracted from the project's IAM Policy + what it inherits.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT member, count(1) as count FROM gcp_iam_role_member rm
WHERE rm.resource_type = 'project' AND 
rm.resource_name IN (SELECT CONCAT('projects/', project) FROM unnest(ARRAY[$gcp_project]) as project)
GROUP by member;

panels.title: Roles per Principal

panels.description: Lists all principal to role mappings per project.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT resource_name, member as principal, role
FROM gcp_iam_role_member as rm
WHERE resource_type = 'project' AND
resource_name IN (SELECT CONCAT('projects/', id) FROM unnest(ARRAY[${gcp_project}]) as id);

panels.title: Principle Roles
